availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John White Cobb (Jessamine County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sally Cobb. Father of James W. Cobb, Nathan M. Cobb, Henry H. Cobb, Sophronia Cobb, Pendleton Cobb, John T. Cobb, Conrad Cobb, Fountain Cobb, and Sarah Cobb. Farmer in Jessamine County in 1850. Farmer in Jessamine County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, Division 1, p. 34A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, p. 45.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, District 3, p. 28A.
Find A Grave, "John W. Cobb (1818-1893)," Memorial #9118254, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/9118254 (accessed March 23, 2020).
